General.Name: Nanjing Wondux Environmental Protection Technology Corp Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Wondux Environmental Protection Technology Corp., Ltd. provides environmental protection technology and equipment. It provides solutions for treatment of garbage pollution, such as landfill leachate treatment, landfill pollution remediation, and food waste disposal; industrial wastewater treatment and recycling, which comprises zero discharge treatment, ecological environment, and SEDI ultrapure water preparation; and ecological environment restoration, including site pollution remediation, water environment governance, and manages rural environment. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
